events.name: Challenges across the LIBs supply and value chains
events.wd_label: Challenges across the LIBs supply and value chains
events.wd_description: Comprehensive challenges encountered in the supply and value chains of lithium-ion batteries (LIBs), including supply-demand issues of raw materials and manufacturing considerations.
events.description: Comprehensive challenges encountered in the supply and value chains of lithium-ion batteries (LIBs), including supply-demand issues of raw materials and manufacturing considerations.

events.name: Supply and demand of battery raw materials
events.wd_label: Supply and demand of battery raw materials
events.wd_description: Challenges in securing raw materials for LIB production, focusing on critical materials like Lithium, Cobalt, and Graphite, and the associated supply risks, geopolitical issues, and environmental impacts.
events.description: Challenges in securing raw materials for LIB production, focusing on critical materials like Lithium, Cobalt, and Graphite, and the associated supply risks, geopolitical issues, and environmental impacts.

events.name: Lithium supply challenges
events.wd_description: Issues related to the production of Lithium, including energy and water consumption, environmental impacts, and the need for increased production to meet demand.
events.description: Issues related to the production of Lithium, including energy and water consumption, environmental impacts, and the need for increased production to meet demand.

events.name: Cobalt supply challenges
events.wd_description: Criticality concerns due to political instability in the main producer country, DRC, and issues such as child labor and concentration of production and refining in China.
events.description: Criticality concerns due to political instability in the main producer country, DRC, and issues such as child labor and concentration of production and refining in China.

events.name: Graphite supply challenges
events.wd_description: Concerns over the concentration of production and reserves in China and the global abundance of Graphite with recent exploration developments.
events.description: Concerns over the concentration of production and reserves in China and the global abundance of Graphite with recent exploration developments.

events.name: Supply estimation variability
events.wd_description: Differences in mineral concentration assumptions, reserve estimates, and future extraction project uncertainties lead to variability in material supply estimations.
events.description: Differences in mineral concentration assumptions, reserve estimates, and future extraction project uncertainties lead to variability in material supply estimations.

events.name: Manufacturing considerations
events.wd_description: Issues related to the manufacturing of LIBs, including cost reductions, energy consumption, and environmental impacts.
events.description: Issues related to the manufacturing of LIBs, including cost reductions, energy consumption, and environmental impacts.

events.name: Cost reduction strategies
events.wd_description: Various approaches to reduce the manufacturing costs of LIBs, including material selection, manufacturing process improvements, and design enhancements.
events.description: Various approaches to reduce the manufacturing costs of LIBs, including material selection, manufacturing process improvements, and design enhancements.

events.name: Energy consumption
events.wd_description: High energy consumption during the manufacturing stage and its consequent environmental impacts, with a focus on the carbon intensity of energy sources.
events.description: High energy consumption during the manufacturing stage and its consequent environmental impacts, with a focus on the carbon intensity of energy sources.

events.name: Environmental impacts
events.wd_description: Environmental impacts of LIB manufacturing, including life cycle greenhouse gas emissions and the need for renewable energy sources in production.
events.description: Environmental impacts of LIB manufacturing, including life cycle greenhouse gas emissions and the need for renewable energy sources in production.
